trans-unit.source: Obtains the file locations of Web services discovery documents for use in populating another Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os locais de arquivos de documentos de descoberta de serviços da Web para uso no preenchimento de outro documento de descoberta de serviços da Web.

trans-unit.source: The DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: A classe DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern herda da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern>classe e empregado pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>da classe <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>método, que manipula uma solicitação HTTP para um documento de descoberta.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern>

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, nenhuma dessas classes precisa ser usada diretamente por um desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"></xref> object for a given discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"> </xref> objeto para um documento de descoberta especificado.

trans-unit.source: The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.

A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> instance contains the location of the .vsdisco file, which is also the file system directory corresponding to the HTTP request passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference>instância contém o local do arquivo .vsdisco, que também é o arquivo de diretório do sistema correspondente à solicitação de HTTP é passado para o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference>

trans-unit.source: The file-system path of the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do sistema de arquivo do documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"></xref> object that specifies the location of a .vsdisco file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"> </xref> objeto que especifica o local de um arquivo de .vsdisco.

trans-unit.source: Gets the file-name pattern to use as a search target.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de arquivo padrão a ser usado como um destino de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The pattern "*.disco" indicates a Web services discovery document extension, .disco.
trans-unit.target: O padrão "*. disco" indica a extensão de documento de descoberta de serviços de um Web. disco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern> class, on the other hand, indicates a .vsdisco extension.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern>classe, por outro lado, indica uma extensão de .vsdisco.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern>
A cadeia de caracteres literal "*. disco".
